name: Application Tracker (Free)
description: [To get access: Sign up to Notion > Duplicate template]Use this free customizable job application template to gather and organize:• Deadlines• Milestones• Posting URL• Applied positions• Stage of application• Due dates/deadlines• Emails sent/received• Company notes/to-do'sIt's typically used by job seekers to streamline the hiring process. Good luck!
